segments.text: A group of woman walk on front people exercising.

critique:
He stands behind the TV rather than next to it.
There is no group of women.

temporal.caption: People exercise on fitness machines while people sits on front and watch.
A man pass on front holding a jacket and stand next a TV.
A group of woman walk on front people exercising.

captions.full: People exercise on fitness machines while people sits on front and watch. A man pass on front holding a jacket and stand next a TV. A group of woman walk on front people exercising.
